attributes.action: Inform all citizens by post when a new act of parliament is passed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many statutes or acts of parliament are passed without the people knowing.  Although information is available on the internet, many people do not realise this, and some do not have access to the internet.  If and when a new statute is passed, a copy should be sent to every household in the affected area so as people cannot be arrested by commiting offences they never even knew existed.
